items.content_html: ImageGrouper.js - A lightweight JavaScript library for organizing images using blank delimiter detection. Features robust color-based blank image identification, flexible grouping options, and folder scanning capabilities. Perfect for automating image organization tasks with customizable naming schemes and folder structures.
items.title: merchantweb/img-grouper: ImageGrouper.js - A lightweight JavaScript library for organizing images using blank delimiter detection. Perfect for automating image organization tasks with customizable naming schemes and folder structures.
